title: Spectating
body: Whenever I try to spectate a mates game, the game never loads and it comes up saying Failed to Load Spectate Data. The game will now exit? Is this happening to anyone else and how do I fix it?

replies.body: There appears to be an issue with spectating atm, it's been passed on and should hopefully get fixed up soon :)
Yeah no I've noticed this, because we're currently hosting a tournament and nobody can spectate the games
